title.rendered: airBaltic Offers – Cheap and Flexible Flight Tickets for Youth

content.rendered:
Get Cheap and Flexible Flight Tickets for Youth by airBaltic

  • Age limit 12 to 25
  • Visit ticket office at Riga International Airport
  • Book your ticket for a fixed price
  • Take a checked bag (up to 20 kg) with you and change the date once, with no charge

To book tickets click here

Terms and Conditions

  • The advertised fares apply to airBaltic–operated direct one-way flights in Economy service class, purchased at the airBaltic airport ticket office at Riga International Airport or via airBaltic call centre. The fares are not available online.
  • If you are buying round-trip ticket, we would like to inform you, that the indicated price can differ, depending on the tax amount in the departure city.

View this deal here
